reference.shortdesc: The indexlist element indicates to the processing software that the author wants an index at the particular location.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: When the href attribute is not specified, a processor might generate an index at the specified location in the map. If the href attribute is specified, the referenced topic or map contains a manually created index.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The indexlist element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the bookmap module.
